A bicycle with a built-in AI assistant that can help riders navigate through traffic and provide real-time traffic updates. The AI can also suggest the best routes to take based on the rider's destination and traffic conditions.
A bicycle that converts into a hoverbike using electromagnetic fields. The hoverbike mode allows riders to glide above traffic and reach their destination faster.
A bicycle with a detachable drone that can fly ahead and scout out the route, providing real-time updates and recommendations to the rider.
A bicycle with a built-in exercise bike that generates electricity to power the bike's lights, computer, and other accessories.
